panels.description: tempo de resposta no ultimo minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])

panels.title: Response TIME

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos ultimos 5 minutos

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="500"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="400"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="404"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="200", uri="/user"}[1m]) / http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="200", uri="/user"}

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="200", uri="/user/{id}"}[1m]) / http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="observable-app", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="200", uri="/user/{id}"}
